title: [Large-scale] Learner-Centered E-Learning System Design: Short-Term Intensive Course for Practical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic LMS (Learning Management System) usage skills and online learning experience, foundational knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Enhancing competency in designing customized e-learning systems to improve workplace efficiency for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design e-learning content structures based on learner needs analysis
Learners can evaluate LMS interfaces containing interactive elements according to user experience (UX) principles
Learners can analyze formative assessment data to develop content improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
